name: Will The Adventurous Treasure Journey
description:
Will - an adventurous journey for treasure

  Welcome adventurer, immerse yourself in a world of danger, traps,
mysterious ghosts, keys, doors and other mechanisms.

  Can you, with your wit, overcome the creators of the dark underground
and get through all the insidious and intricate parts of the maze to the treasure itself?

  The journey will not be easy, dozens of doors, keys and mechanisms await you.
If you are fooled by the creator of the labyrinth, you will die a horrible death from starvation.  In addition to traps, countless spirits of previous adventurers await you, who are hungry for your life energy, which they suck out of you in an instant.

  It only depends on your courage if you set out on this thorny path to fame and fortune.

Good luck!

MiK
